items.title: Grizzly bear on loose after attacking school group in Canada, injuring 11
items.description: A male teacher "got the whole brunt" of the attack and some children were hit with bear spray.

items.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
items.description: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

items.title: 'A lot of fighting': Fossil fuel row breaks out at UN climate summit
items.description: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

items.title: I'll stamp all over 'serious fighter' Jake Paul, says Anthony Joshua
items.description: Briton Anthony Joshua says he will "stomp all over" Jake Paul and "break" the American as the pair come face-to-face to promote their heavyweight figh...
